title: The Adventures of Spot (Captioned)
brief_description: This collection of seven stories is based on the book by Eric Hill, featuring Spot - a young puppy, Sally and Sam his mother and father, and several of his friends. The films deal in a simple and entertaining way with the everyday happenings familiar to children the world over. 1. Sweet Dreams, Spot! 2. Spot Goes to School 3. Spot Goes to the Circus 4. Spot Follows his Nose 5. Spot Goes Splash 6. Spot’s Windy Day 7. Spot Goes on Holiday
